format_gml_Object_obj_ch3_epilogue_text_: A chocolate cake@ For sharing.
Well, this is my room.
It's not much, but I hope you like it!
Damn, this room is BIG@ Are you holding out on us?
What? No! I've just always stayed up here, and...
Relax{ I'm just messing with you@ It looks nice.
My room was really dusty, and the walls were all scratched up...
But enough about that@ We have more important matters to attend to.
Movie night!
Wait, is that...
...Okay, fine@ I'll leave some crumbs for you guys.
You've made so many friends from our adventures, Kris.
Because of that, we have plenty of guests now!
Y'know, I was expecting a dump, but this isn't half bad.
Could be improved with some ominous curtains and gun racks.
How about your room} I hope you liked it.
It's acceptable.
I decked it out with tons of badass and dangerous stuff@
Unfortunately, it's already full of holes.
Oh no, did Lancer get to it} I'll remind him to use the doors.
Nah@ Me and my crew had an awesome gang war in there.
Speaking of Lancer, shouldn't he be here too?
Ho ho ho!!{ I finally found the right room!
Don't worry about the hole, my bespectacled amigo@ It'll grow back!
My sniffer is sniffing a delicious smell@ A sweet and smelly smell.
That's the cake@ Want some?
No thanks@ Girldad says I can only eat that on my cake day!
Your... what?
I have no idea, but it sounds delicious!
Phew That Digging Took Forever
I Was Lost Until My Clever Spawn Found Your Castle
This Castle Really Needs A Map LMAO
BTW Kris If Your Bed Is In A Sinkhole It
It Was Already Like That When I Tunneled Through OK
Anyway I Brought The Movies And Stuff
Didn't know you liked movies this much.
Oh I Never Watched These LOL
I Snatched These A While Ago From A Bunch Of Pirates
Are those DVDs... safe?
Oh Yes Totally 100% Nothing Safer
But If You Find A Wooden Horse In That Box You Should Probably Run
What?
Somebody order a screeeeeeen!?
You get the biggest room AND a huge TV??
Sorry for the delay, I had to skim the manual.
It's as good as new@ Any channels you want, this beauty's got it!
What@ Is@ That@
Just Some Movies I Stole
Torrented films... on MY screen??
You'd defile my beauties with that FILTH!?
Yea
Unbelievable... UNBELIEVABLE!!!
Dude... it's just some movies.
...Enjoy your new TV...
It's got a 12 month warranty... call us any time...
He'll Get Over It In Like 2 Seconds Anyway My Work Here Is Done
As Much As I Like To Watch Stolen Movies On Voicechat...
I Am Super Super Busy With Queenly Matters (Getting Drunk)
Toodles
Damn, she has... like EVERY sequel to ICE-E The Movie in here.
"The Butterfly and The Dragon"... Sounds metal.
Are there lots and lots of explosions!?
I dunno. Never watched it.
Won't you guys get tired if you keep standing like that?
Well, that depends on the type of Darkner...
Lucky@ It's a pain having to stand all day in school.
Y-you don't have chairs for class?
We lost chair privileges after I threw one at my teacher@ Accidentally.
(With nothing better to do,)
(You decided to close your eyes and think about Castle Town...)
And... done{ It looks perfect!
Thanks for the help, you three!
Sis} What are you doing here} I thought you would be with Kris.
It's not my style@ Kris and their friends will do fine without me.
...besides, that mad clown and heterochromatic swindler would drive me crazy all over again.
I see...
This looks nice@ What is it forforforforforfor?
I noticed this town's lack of televised entertainment.
This shop will aid the heroes AND serve as a studio for all my ideas!
Still living in the spotlight?
It's what I'm good at!
...It's what you're good at, too.
I'd love to have your help around here. Beats the mad clowns, right?
I suppose it doesdoesdoesdoesdoesdoes
I... really shouldn't though.
I failed as a star, and failed to accomplish anything else@ I'm out of dreams to pursue.
It's never too late to find new ones!
Kris says cheesy things like that too@ I can see where they get it from...
I'm sorry for leaving you behind, sis@ I won't ever do it again.
Please... stick around and help me?
...Okay.
HELL YEAH{ THE BEST DUO SINCE 1997 IS BACK!
Don't push it.
Mike?
What's up?
While I was... connected to the resonance, I heard her voice.
Loomi's voice.
Even while sealed away, she still thinks about you often.
I just thought you'd like to hear thatthatthatthatthatthat
...Thank you, Foane.
Maybe we can find a way to save her someday...?
Heh@ Maybe...
... What was all that red stuff?
Uh, blood} Lancer, you mentioned blood like two days ago??
Oho, so that's what that is!!
Next time, we should perhaps check the age rating first...?
Yeesh, my hand's still tingling after watching that... my bad, Lancer.
Even if the movie was rather aggressive... that was still fun.
I guess being with friends can make scary movies more enjoyable?
You're going to KILL me saying things like that. I'm out of here.
I think I like it here after all@ See you around, Kris.
This movie night    Pissed me off...
That's my cue@ Toodles!
...For the record, it WAS fun.
I'm glad you enjoyed it, Susie!
I'd like this week... to be as fun as possible.
Yeah{ We should do this again.
Same time next week?
...Are you like, super emotional, or...?
N-no! I mean, I didn't mean to come off that way!
Next week... sounds good@ I'd love to do something like this again...
...Anyway@ See ya later.
Kris, can you stay for a moment?
It's important.
Um, this may sound strange, but recently I've been thinking...
Thinking about... what I want.
I thought I already knew what that was, but then I met you and Susie.
This castle was empty for the longest time@ In fact...
... I don't even remember how I got here, or who came before me.
I didn't know the first thing about having friends... until now.
We've done so much, met so many people...
And thanks to you, I've realized how valuable friendship really is!
It means so much to me... so I...
I want to protect that, Kris... to do whatever I can for the best outcome.
So... what if...
What if there was a way... to prepare for what comes next?
What if we could figure out the Roaring Knight's next move, or identity}
Is that silly of me to think} Would such a thing even be possible?
If you'd like to try too, Kris, then...
Why don't we close our eyes...
...and think about what the Knight is doing?
format_gml_Object_obj_ch3_foaneend_text_: Ha...
Hahahaha...!
Loomi's heart... my heart... they both beat in sync!
I feel closer to that heavenly signal than ever before!
Impressive work, pulling all those strings...
But your disCORDant signals will never breach my harmony!
W-what...?
What's going on...?
The resonance... I can't... I can't hear it.
No...
Still swinging away, little heroes?
Or have you realized that these strings CAN'T be cut?
Only I can pull them, and only I can break themthemthemthemthemthem!
Keep draining my energy@ It won't matter.
As long as that hymn courses through me, I can keep fighting!
I can...
H-Huh...?
My body's... giving upupupupupup?
No{ Stay up, STAY UP!
It can't end here!!
It... can't...
I... lost the signal.
All those thoughts...
Were any of them... truetruetruetruetruetrue?
Or have I failed... again?
I was right@ It is truly impossible.
Nothing I do matters, and it never will@ Once I let go, I'll be back to square one.
...Even now, you still think it's possible?
After everything, you haven't given up?
Hahaha...
Thank you.
Don't worry about me, Kris.
Even though my journey is ending in a flatline...
I feel... acceptance.
That freedom I've spent so long chasing clearly isn't mine to take.
But you} There's still hope for you.
While others fall to despair, you can climb to the top.
Answer the call and set yourself freefreefreefreefreefree
Who knows} Maybe you'll keep that promise...
...and eventually save me.
... Don't worry about me, Kris.
Even though my journey is ending in a flatline...
I feel... acceptance.
That freedom I've spent so long chasing clearly isn't mine to take.
But you} There's still hope for you.
While others fall to despair, you can climb to the top.
Answer the call@ Set yourself freefreefreefreefreefree
Hopefully you get some use out of this.
(You got EarRinger.)
(You got WireCutter.)
(You got ShadowCrystal.)
... See you soon, Kris.
Okay... there's no way we can pretend THAT didn't just happen.
Susie...
Three times in a row} Something's wrong here.
I'm tired of being kept in the dark about this.
... What's going on, Kris?
Kris is probably worn out after
If I wanted your opinion, I would've asked!
... Ugh, sorry@ I just...
I'll... see you guys in Castle Town.
The fountain should be clear now.
I'll see you soon, Kris.

that's why... this world won't be the same after today.
i will establish peace and order...

I'm answering a call@ The same call I heard all those years agoagoagoagoagoago

No more wasting away, dreaming of what I can't havehavehavehavehavehave

format_gml_Object_obj_kreid_aftermath_Dr: When... When your friends find you...
There'll be nothing left of you but a STAIN ON THE GROUND.
You... YOU...
(Kris muttered something.)
What'd you say?
Speak up. TALK TO ME.
(Kris told Kreid that they never did anything wrong.)
Oh yeah} Then what was it?
Why did you LEAVE ME BEHIND, Kris!?
(Kris realized their outward appearance would never change who they were.)
(It was a choice they had to make for themselves.)
(When Kris realized that...)
(They didn't need Kreid to help them anymore.)
Hah... hahahaha...
That's... that's so saccharine.
But...
You couldn't have known what would happen when you threw me away.
I know that.
But it still hurt@ It hurt a lot.
I was just trying to be like them@ Toriel, Asgore, Azzy...
Just like you wanted.
I thought I had messed up, failed my job...
I think I understand now.
I wanted to look perfect for you, but...
You couldn't lean on me forever@ It wouldn't have helped us.
Heheheh... it doesn't matter what you look like, Kris.
From where I stand, you're just like them now.
Tenna's guys will show up soon...
No way they'll ignore the explosion at the bottom of their tower.
Dunno where your friends are, but I'd hurry up and find them.
You've got a long way to the top.
Don't worry, my crew's done with you.
I've got a lot to think about, so... see you around?
...What?
Stop giving me that look!
You know what} Sure.
Ugh...
Hell no@ I'm not hugging you after you beat me up like that!
That's what you get.
Get outta here.
I'll distract the Luminous Guards, but it won't buy you much time.
You'll be fine@ You're surprisingly annoying to kill.
Don't make this weird.

Now that you mention it...
Yeah, it's weird.
Isn't it} They're all

...I was talking about the people reading newspapers.
Gig's up, boys!
(Not again!!)
Howdy.
Kreid!?
Chairiel gave you some tips on avoiding Tenna's security, huh?
Guess she forgot that she taught me all her tricks.
Any plan your tiny brains could try, I already thought of.
You came all the way up here for us?
You must be really eager to lose again.
Cute, but I'm tired of playing with you two.
HEY!!
H-Hang in there, Kris!
Have a nice flight!
(Actually, we should parachute out before Kreid wrecks the plane...!)
Well} Are you just gonna keep standing there?
All this time and you've still got nothing to say to me?
At least have the nerve to say you can't stand me{ Say it to my face!
SAY SOMETHING!
format_gml_Object_obj_primflower_Draw_73: It is certainly weird to see new faces around here~
Ah, you are very forward, are you not?
But please, do take a look around you.
Do you not think I have enough garbage already?
As you may have gathered already, I am not from around here.
Meeting people here and there, and even teaching some of them~
But as you can see, I am not in the best of situations right now.
Is that not so sad? haha~
Nowadays, I just relax in this place, selling whatever I can sell...
And talking to whoever I can talk to~
You sure seem interested in little old me...
How about I invite you to a cup of tea before we talk any further?
Hm?
Well, is that not interesting~
You need not ask me the reason for my journey.
You will understand the need to find yourself sooner than you think~
A curious duo, they are.
You see, the story of this world is neck deep in conflict~
Imagine being watched all the time by a whole family...
Only for said family to be torn apart.
The TV- The Cathode was by all means abandoned.
That was what led Loomi Neus to such desperation.
And desperation... Haha~
It leads to obsession.
But you already knew that.
...Hmm? You did not know?
Haha, you are right, how silly of me~
Ah, The Roaring Knight in Golden Armor...
It is very interesting, is it not?
The power of will, the power to stand unfazed in front of the insurmountable.
This power of... Determination.
You have so many questions about them~
But do not worry... You both are fated to clash.
I hope that, by then, you are... Determined enough, to confront impending destiny~
As you can see, I enjoy freedom@ I do as I please~
...Pfft.
I am jesting.
That is not what you mean, do you?
Knowledge is dangerous, Kris@ It can bring someone to insanity with ease.
And this insanity... is born from obsession.
To be something more, to achieve a goal they didn't know existed before...
These hopes and dreams... they can take physical form.
Shadow Crystals.
One of the rarest materials across the Dark Dimension, precious to both Lightners and Darkners...
However... obsession can also give someone an intense drive.
It could even turn an inoffensive person into a formidable foe, you know?~
You will find out more... in due time.
That stuffed cat is still blind? Haha~
It is difficult not to see these crystals, with the darkness they ooze.
Then again, only purification was that cat's forte~
But do not worry. Artisanship is my specialty~
I will help you make a new Shadow Mantle.
Do keep your eyes on it, lest you lose it again~
Think of it as a favor, considering I am going to stay in your town from now on~
...You do not mind, do you?
Whenever you need to make something with these crystals, come find me.
Nothing can escape my sight~
Take care... we will see each other very, very soon~

format_gml_Object_obj_sio_text_pathout_D: God, can you walk any slower, or what?
You know, despite the danger, this adventure was pretty fun!
Yeah, this was an awesome sleepover after all!
... Still no sign of that "Knight" we keep hearing about, though.
The Roaring Knight... what is it they truly want?
Call me crazy, but... I don't think they're trying to end the world.
If that's all they wanted, they're doing a pretty crappy job at it.
Maybe they're looking for something... a means to an end?
But what would even be worth risking the Roaring over?
I'm sure we'll understand... when we eventually face them.
Yeah@ They're going to make another fountain, and when they do...
But... you two should really get going now.
We can worry about that later@ It's time to wake up.
Heh@ Don't need to tell me twice.
format_gml_Object_obj_sio_text_postbattl: Okay, look.
My goal was to fry your brains.
You know, so you would stop messing with my system and stuff.
But seeing as you still have functioning brains...
And my "Lethal Attacks" film reel is running out...
Can we just call it quits here? Come to an agreement?
You're finally willing to hear us out...?
I want you to unconditionally surrender.
Yeah... pass.
Fine, if you won't negotiate...
MAXIMIKE'S HP AND DEFENSE MAXED OUT!
I guess I'll just redo all those attacks.
Again.
And again.
And again.
I don't care what it takes to wear you down...
You will NOT close this fountain.
TAKE 2!!
I said...
Sorry to rain on your parade, Sis...
But I'm afraid one will have to do!
Mike... cut it out.
Kris, Susie, thanks for waking me up.
We've been doing this song and dance for too long... I'm calling it quits.
THIS SHOW'S OVER!
GUESS WHO'S BACK!?
Is that it, then?
We win?
...You're a fool, Mike...
Sis...
Why? Why won't you just listen?
Why won't you trust me!?
...I've always trusted you, Tenna.
Even when I didn't agree... even when it hurt to send her away...
I stood by you.
But when is enough enough?
We haven't performed for Lightners in ages... our own people lost interest.
We've done everything we can for this show@ It's... time to move on.
I can't imagine a world outside of my control.
If something bad happens, who will stop it?
You can't just expect everything to go your way, dude.
Things'll happen whether you like it or not.
So what, you expect me to do nothing} Let everything rust away?
Hell no!
Just saying, stop trying to make everything go how you want it.
Maybe... listen to someone else, for once.
You've got a good brother@ You can figure things out together.
So forget the stupid TV show!
You won't be able to control everything, but when stuff happens...
There's plenty of folks who can help you make the best choice.
That's what friends are for@ Right, Ralsei?
Huh?
Y-Yeah, I guess so!
I trusted you, so please... trust me.
...Fine@ Do what you want.
Hug it out?
Don't push it.
Thank you for understanding.
I promise your people will be safe and happy in Castle Town!
It's about time we wrap things up, shouldn't we...?
Guess this is goodbye for now, then.
SIS, ROLL CREDITS!
Can we... not?
Heh. You're no fun.
Sheesh@ Tenna couldn't even wait a few minutes before falling asleep.
...Guess we should talk about it, then@ Come closer.
I said I trusted you, didn't I?
Then do me a favor... and tell them you made the fountain.
It's bad to keep secrets from friends.
I don't know why you did it, but thank you.
After years of silence, we got to have one last show.
And you gotta admit, even if we nearly killed you a little...
IT MADE FOR ONE HELL OF A FINALE!
I won't keep you anymore. Go get 'em, tiger!
format_gml_Object_obj_sio_text_prelude_D: Are you even listening to yourself right now?
I wasn't for a long time, but I am now.
I can't do this anymore, Tenna- No, Heinrike.
You and I both know this show can't keep going.
Stop being selfish@ We're all our people have left!
Do you really want to bring this world back to darker days!?
You saw what happened when we shut down after Loomi...
I KNOW, I KNOW!
But what about the Lightners?
You heard what they said@ If this fountain stays open...
Bad things will happen to everyone.
Did you actually buy that "Roaring" nonsense?
I thought you were smarter@ They're manipulating you.
Our streets haven't been this lit up in years, Mike...
I can't let them take this away from us. Not this time.
We're holding on to something that ended long ago, sis.
And if we make them stay, what'll happen then?
The show continues for another season} Two} Three}
When will the next tragedy come?
I can't force them to stay here. I won't.
I can't believe you. You've let them fill your head with lies...
Kris{ You made it!
Tenna, sealing the fountain isn't the end of everything.
Yeah{ We aren't just going to leave you here.
In Castle Town, all kinds of Darkners live together peacefully.
You and all your people can come there. There's plenty of room!
Oh, how convenient!
A fancy little town that can solve all our problems.
You think Ralsei, Lancer and Rouxls just showed up out of nowhere?
Susie.
Even if you three are telling the truth, what would that change?
If you seal this fountain, who's to say that town won't be next?
We'll end up the same no matter what fountain we call home.
Things will be different this time, sis. I trust them.
Sorry, Mike.
...For wh
The hell are you doing!?
Changing the channel.
He'll be fine. I just can't let him listen to any more of this.
And while he's asleep...
WE'LL dispose of you.
...Mike?
Hah!
Kris, Kris, Kris...
Do you think you can show up in MY world and seal MY fountain...
And pretend you're friends with my brother?
You're a fool... I'm done with you.
Mike won't be deceived by your tricks anymore.
This show's over.
format_gml_Object_obj_tallposter_Draw_73: Well, there is a poster here.
"Have you seen this man{ Help on the way{ Can't help{ Call now!"
The rest seems to be incoherent.
Will I escape the airport?!?!? Will my car escape the airport?!?!?!

format_gml_Object_obj_tenna_sof_Draw_73_: This is exactly what I was afraid of.
If you know something about this, now would be a good time to share.
Our predecessor, Loomi Neus, built this place.
A vault in the depths of our world, situated at its very edge.
It was built to pick up... signals.
The kind no Darkner should ever hear.
After Loomi's... crisis, and Foane listening to her words, I sealed it.
Nobody else knew of this place's existence except for me.
Apparently, that's no longer the case.
Please stop Foane@ She's tapping into forces beyond her control.
I'd help, but I swore to never come near this place again.
And... this whole night has been tiring me out...
format_gml_Object_obj_tower_text_Draw_73: The explosion came from over here!
Kris!!
Are you okay?
You won't believe what we just went through!
After they threw us out of that plane, I thought we were done for...
But I used my scarf to parachute us to safety!
And then we landed on a balcony and some enemies were having a cookout.
Susie asked them nicely to share their food...
And then asked them to check out the bottom of a trash can.
We broke into the building and
And the Cathode Crew is INSANE.
Every door has a color coded lock and started spewing fire at us!
Don't forget the buzzsaws...
Dude, Ralsei almost went bald from a flying chainsaw!
Haha, you're lucky I saved you from the shark tank!
Only because I pushed you out of the way of a falling anvil.
Forget about us! Are YOU okay, Kris!?
I can't believe we let them get the drop on us...
If we see Kreid again, can I shove them into a locker for you?
No need to panic, Susie@ It seems like Kris managed to win.
I doubt the Shadowmen will be much of a bother from now on.
Yeah... you're probably right.
We'd better get going, Kris@ There's still half a tower to climb.
By the way, Kris...
I couldn't help but notice that you're... smiling.
